import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-with-fillings', templateUrl: './with-fillings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./with-fillings.component.css'] }) export class WithFillingsComponent { } Blog card
Is Apple a Design Company?

Apple is more than a tech company; it became a culture unto itself, a passion of most of people and the birthplace of the world’s most revolutionized products.
